comments: Numbers ending in 3 or 8. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jul 08 2006Also numbers congruent to {3,8,13} mod 15. - _Gary Detlefs_, Mar 07 2010Number of moves in game of Brussels Sprouts with n+1 crosses. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 09 2014
references: Elwyn R. Berlekamp, John Conway, and Richard K. Guy, Winning Ways for your Mathematical Plays, A K Peters, 2001.
L. Hogben, Choice and Chance by Cardpack and Chessboard. Vol. 1, Chanticleer Press, NY, 1950, p. 36.
links: Teena Gerhadt and Brady Haran, Brussels Sprouts - Numberphile (2014)
formula: a(n) = floor((15n+10)/3). - _Gary Detlefs_, Mar 07 2010a(n) = 10*n-a(n-1)+1, (with a(0)=3). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010G.f.: (3+2*x)/(1-x)^2. - _Colin Barker_, Jan 08 2012
maple: a[1]:=3:for n from 2 to 100 do a[n]:=a[n-1]+5 od: seq(a[n], n=1..57); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 16 2008
prog: (Sage) [i+3 for i in range(285) if gcd(i,5) == 5] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 20 2009(PARI) a(n)=5*n+3 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 09 2014
crossrefs: Cf. similar sequences with closed form (2*k-1)*n+k listed in A269044.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jul 06 2000
